title: Vomiting Vincent

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• The aim of this game is to explore different body parts that can be used to activate a switch.
• Record "dinner time!" onto a switch and plug a wired switch into it.
• Use the hand puppet (Vincent) to pick up the wired switch and pretend he eats it.
• Then place the wired switch next to a different body part (e.g. head, foot, elbow) and pretend Vincent has "vomited" it out there.
• Each time the switch user presses the switch to say, "dinner time!", Vincent eats the wired switch again and "vomits" it out beside a new body part.

tooltipText: This game helps you find a second body part to activate a switch using a puppet, so you can begin exploring Gear 3 activities.
